mapper.select: select left(sidoCode,2) sidoCode, sidoName from sidocode order by sidoCode
select left(gugunCode,5) gugunCode, gugunName from guguncode where left(gugunCode,2) = #{sido} order by gugunCode
select distinct dongName, dongCode from houseinfo where left(dongCode, 5) = #{gugun} order by dongName
select h.aptCode, h.aptName, h.buildyear, h.dongCode, h.dongName, h.jibun, h.lat, h.lng from houseinfo h where dongCode = #{dong} order by aptName
select no, dealAmount, dealYear, dealMonth, dealDay, area, floor from housedeal where aptCode = #{apt} order by no
SELECT dongCode, concat(sidoName," ",gugunName," ",dongName) address FROM dongcode where dongName like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')

SELECT aptCode , aptName, dongCode, (SELECT concat(sidoName," ",gugunName," ",dongName) FROM dongcode where dongcode.dongCode = houseinfo.dongCode) address FROM houseinfo where aptName like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
